basics.name: Mark Lewin
basics.label: Technical writer
basics.summary: I am an experienced technical writer specialising in API and other developer documentation, with a background in developing and delivering training for software developers.

work.summary: I was brought on board to advise on a strategy for documenting Shell’s range of APIs for partner developers. My responsibilities include:
highlights: Advising on tools and methodologies for a “docs as code” workflow
Creating new documentation, including API references, conceptual guides, and instructional material

work.summary: I worked as a technical writer in the Product team, documenting APIs and SDKs for the company’s realtime communications platform.
highlights: Creating, maintaining and updating Ably's API reference documentation
Writing conceptual guides and tutorials to educate developers
Developing code samples and demonstration applications in Node.js/JavaScript, Python, and other languages
